name: Maze Escape (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description:

This game is a tense horror escape maze. You as the player have to find a gun to shoot the zombies in the maze. Killing zombies will drop a random amount of keys from 0-2. If you collect three keys, then you win the game.

Controls:

  • WASD to move in all directions
  • Use the mouse to look around and shoot by clicking
  • Press F to pick up the gun
  • Press C to pick up the keys
